column5:
Merge pull request #122 from msmathers/feature/durability

Fixes harvester durability issues, addresses #70, #85, #114, #120
Set logging levels to error, made functional tests more durable
Fixed /bin/ script imports, removed functional tests from cake build (temp)
Restrict access to socket.io/express by origins/IPs respectively
Use localstorage to persist screen state
Added key buffer to log message filtering
Adds basic authentication to web server
Handle rename event for log rotation
Harvester checks for file truncation, fixes #56
Fixes Firefox backbone bug with 'watch' events

Adds host bindings for servers, fixes #53

Add a 'host' key to existing server configuration
files in ~/.log.io/ to resemble conf/*_server.conf
Search buffer for delimiter instead of message part
Adds string buffer to TCP sockets, fixes #52
Fixed client stats bug, control text overflow styles
Added coffeescript to dependencies for postinstall cake hook

Merge pull request #51 from msmathers/v0.3.0

v0.3.0

- Complete rewrite using CoffeeScript + Backbone.js
- Server uses backend TCP interface
- Server leverages EventEmitter to decouple components
- Installs in user space, removed forever and adduser dependencies
- No longer daemonized on install, OS-agnostic
- Uses Cake to run builds
- Uses mocha/chai for functional tests
- Replaces LogFile with LogStream concept
  - Harvester configuration maps list of file paths to stream name
  - Web client UI displays nodes by stream name, and vice versa
- Web client UI rebuilt using Backbone.js events, models, and views
Adds basic functional tests, using mocha + sinon + chai
Added control panel scrolling, updated scrollbars
Added bottom stats view to client
Don't allow user to close initial screen
Adds control select, color selection behaviors to web client
Filter functionality for controls and log messages work
Added resize logic to views, filled out HTML/CSS templates
Fixed screen event bug in client
Refactored model heirarchy, use Node/Stream pairs + supporting events
Removed test main in harvester, added exports to server
Harvester uses EventEmitter for log events, now has TCP retry logic
De-JSified harvester code based on feedback
Removed upper bound node.js version restriction

Merge pull request #28 from fzerorubigd/master

install using useradd instead of adduser for better linux support #27 #28 #30

Now compatible with node.js v0.6.11

- Updates socket.io-* dependencies to v0.9.0
- Switched to Iconic icon set in place of famfamfam silk
Eased node.js version restrictions to allow v0.4.9

Adds more colors to resolve #9; 20 total.

Based off Protovis color palette:
http://mbostock.github.com/protovis/docs/color.html
Added prefix directive to README, INSTALL directions
Renamed npm package, updated README, INSTALL

Reworked installation & daemon process using npm & forever.

Updated package.json, makes Log.io a proper NPM package.

This is a first step towards streamlining the installation process
and making Log.io more OS-agnostic.

Added logging module with log levels.

Removed module-level LOGGERs, attached logger instances to
Harvester, Server instances for better encapsulation, stubbing.

Modified Stream, History button CSS, just 'cause.
Set socket.io log level to 1 in LogServer

Merge pull request #10 from msmathers/socket.io_v0.8

Upgrades Log.io to socket.io v0.8.x

- Uses custom events (emit) instead of message_type properties
- Server uses rooms per log file for selective broadcasting

Harvester uses "official" socket.io-client instead of Socket.io-node-client

Unit test updates
Fixed socket.io version check in configure
Readme, configure, package.json updates, adds version history
Readme, configure, package.json updates, adds version history
Updated all unit tests for socket.io v0.8 updates

Upgrades harvester, server, and client components to socket.io v0.8.x.

- Uses custom events (emit) instead of message types
- Server uses rooms per log file for selective broadcasting

TODO(msmathers): Unit test updates

Fixes broken Socket.io-node-client dependency.

Installs in /usr/local/lib/node_modules/, uses global npm installs.
Added socket.io v0.7 warnings, compatibility forthcoming
Added socket.io v0.7 warnings, compatibility forthcoming
